#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include <iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstdio>
#define mod 1000000007
#define max 100001
 
using namespace std;
 
typedef long long ll ;
int get_num()
{
    int num = 0;
    char c = getchar_unlocked();
    int flag = 0;
    while(!((c>='0' && c<='9') || c == '-'))
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    if(c == '-')
    {
        flag = 1;
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    while(c>='0' && c<='9')
    {
        num = (num<<1)+(num<<3)+c-'0';
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    if(flag==0)
        return num;
    else
        return -1*num;
}
void writeInt(int x) 
{
     int i = 10;
     char buf[11];
 
     buf[10] = '\n';
     while (x) 
     {
           buf[--i] = x % 10 + '0';
           x /= 10;
     }
 
     do 
     {
           putchar_unlocked(buf[i]);
     } while (buf[i++] != '\n');
}
 
ll fast_exp(ll a, ll b)
{
	if(b==1)	return a%mod;
 
	else if(b==0)	return 1;
 
	else if(b&1)	return (a*fast_exp((a*a)%mod, b>>1))%mod;
 
	return fast_exp((a*a)%mod, b>>1);
}
ll mod_inv(ll a)
{
    if(a==1) return 1 ;
    
    return fast_exp(a,mod-2) ;
}
ll fact[max] ;
int main() {
    int n,k ;
	fact[0] = 1 ;
	fact[1] = 1;
	ll i ;
	//printf("check %lld\n",fast_exp(2,5)) ;
	for(i=2;i<max;i++)
	 fact[i] = (i*fact[i-1])%mod ;
	int t = get_num() ;
	//printf("check fact[5]=%lld\n ",fact[5]) ;
	while(t--)
	{
	    n = get_num() ;
	    k = get_num() ;
	    if(n<k)
	    {
	        printf("0\n") ;
	        continue ;
	    }
	    else if(k==0 || k==n)
	    {
	        printf("1\n");
	        continue;
	    }
 
	    ll ans = (((fact[n]*mod_inv(fact[n-k]))%mod)*(mod_inv(fact[k])%mod))%mod;
	    printf("%lld\n",ans) ;
	    
	}
	return 0;
}
